name: linter-crystal
description: Lint Crystal using the Crystal compiler

compilerExecPath.title: Compiler Executable Path
compilerExecPath.description: The path (with excutable) to be run by the IDE in the background. By default the IDE will use the compiler in your path.

buildArtifacts.title: Output Build Artifacts
buildArtifacts.description: When true the compiler will create build artifacts when run by the linter.

colorOutput.title: Compiler passing Color Output
colorOutput.description: When false the compiler will not pass ASCII color characters to the linter when run by the linter.

command.title: Compiler Command
command.description: The command passed to the commpiler during linting.
